title: or the FSI required for rehabilitation of existing eligible occupants, whichever is more
clause_text: or the FSI required for rehabilitation of existing eligible occupants, whichever is more. This shall exclusively be used for rehousing existing eligible occupants and for generating additional tenements/units. The BUA of such construction with 1.72 FSI or more shall be termed as RRC

source_pdf.text_snippet: or the FSI required for rehabilitation of existing eligible occupants, whichever is more. This shall exclusively be used for rehousing existing eligible occupants and for generating additional tenemen
